resources.string: You Are the Sole Survivor of a Roman Invasion, Your Village was burnt to the ground and you were captured as a Slave. You arrive in a training camp of some kind.
Your Village Has Been Burned to the Ground, You are the Sole Survivor of the
Massacre, You are Now Property of the Lanista and Will Have to Fight for Your Freedom.
Be careful, If you choose to rest, You may appear weak
